content:

- 50mg: 21

### Adverse Events

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: RB-PD-2341, Description: Dose adjustment documentation incomplete, Severity: minor
- PD ID: RB-PD-2311, Description: Missed scheduled renal ultrasound, rescheduled, Severity: minor

### Events
- Renal ultrasound images uploaded to central imaging core
- eCRF query resolution: 13 queries closed this week
- DSMB safety data snapshot prepared

### Notes
- Week 23: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 84 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
